name: xiaomi robot vacuum mop 2 pro (black)
description:
Product Features:
• High-frequency sonic vibration mopping
• Capable of mapping multiple floors
• 5200mAh battery
• 3000Pa suction
• 4 suction power settings
• 3 vacuum-mop modes

Product Specifications:
• External Dimension: Φ353-96.5mm
• Product Net Weight: 3.6kg
• Rated Voltage: 14.4V
• Nominal Battery Capacity: 5200mAh
• Rated Power: 35.6W
• Charging Voltage: 20V

Package Contents:
• Vacuum-Mop 2 Pro (Black) x1
• User manual x1
• Dustbin x1
• Main brush x1
• Main brush cover x1
• Side brush x1
• Water tank (Mop pad installed) x1
• Mop pad (For replacement) x1
• Charging stand x1
• Power cable x1
• Side brush (For replacement) x1
• Cleaning tool x1
